participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Analytical and practical, often focused on problem-solving.
participant_1.background: I hate insects. I like to eat bacon. My favourite composer is Bach. I speak English. I am an engineer.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and creative, with a strong desire to help others.
participant_2.background: I like to knit hats for babies in the hospital. I am unable to work at a job because of a disability. I am a vegan. I enjoy cooking. I like to listen to country music.
